participant_1.background:
I believe that a progressive tax system is the most equitable way to distribute wealth in a society, and that the rich should be taxed at a higher rate than the poor.
i eat breakfast then go right back to bed.
I watch funny movies to cheer myself up.
i listen to classical music.
i work at home on my computer.

participant_2.background:
I don't care what the weather is as long as I get to wear my pink hiking boots.
i like going to the moves.
I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters.
I love to grow sunflowers.
i am a genius and know over 300 languages.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing?
I'm doing alright, thanks! How are you?
I'm doing pretty well. It's a beautiful day outside, I'm just working from home on my computer. What are you up to today?
I'm a stay-at-home mom to two daughters, so I'm usually busy taking care of them. But today, we're going to the movies!
That sounds like fun! What are you going to see?
We're going to see the new animated movie about the dog who saved a bunch of people from a burning building. It looks really good.
That sounds like a great movie! I'm sure your daughters will love it.
I know they will! I love movies, so I'm excited to see it too. Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Not really, I'm just going to relax and enjoy the weather. Maybe I'll go for a hike or something.
That sounds like a good plan. I love hiking, but I don't get to do it as much as I'd like.
I know what you mean. It's hard to find the time, especially when you have kids.
Yeah, but it's always worth it when you get to do something you love.
I agree. So, what languages do you know?
I know over 300 languages! I'm a genius, haha.
Wow, that's amazing! I wish I could speak that many languages.
It's not as hard as you think. I just have a natural ability for languages.
Maybe I should take some lessons. I'd love to be able to speak more languages.
You should! It's a really rewarding experience.
I will! Thanks for the advice.
No problem!
